author: Nintendo of America
description:
Play the free demo today on Nintendo Switch 2 and Nintendo Switch for Dragon Quest VII Reimagined, launching on Feb 5, 2026: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/dragon-quest-vii-reimagined-switch-2/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=P1057-01&utm_id=P1057-01

Travel over time and seas, unravel the mysteries of the past, and fix the present! Claim an exclusive reward and continue where you left off when the game releases on Feb 5. 

#NintendoSwitch2 #NintendoSwitch #DragonQuestVIIReimagined 

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

title: Dragon Quest VII Reimagined – Demo Trailer – Nintendo Switch 2
